name: Snapmaker test (0.4 nozzle)
machine_start_gcode:
;===== machine: LAVA - T3 ========================
;===== date: 20250317 =====================
;===== 预热热床 =================
M140 S{bed_temperature_initial_layer_single}
;=====打印头取、发状态检测（取、放所有）=================
SM_CHECK_EXTRUDER_STATUS
;===== 取出1号挤出头 =================
T0
M104 S140
;=====粗回零=================
G28 X Y
M109 S140
G28 Z SAMPLES 1
;===== 检测钢板有没放置 =================
DETECT_BED_PLATE
;===== 第一个挤出头预热 =================
;M104 S140 T{initial_extruder} （ 暂时没用这个 ）
M109 S175
;===== 粗刷 =================
;===== 粗刷-1:把料粘附在热床上 ================
M83
G1 E-1 F500
G90
G0 X5 Y5 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 Z2 F300
G0 X7 Y5 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X9 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X11 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X13 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X15 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X17 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X19 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X21 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X23 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 X25 Z2 F12000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G0 Z10 F300
;===== 粗刷-2:在硅胶刷上粗刷 ================
;===== 粗刷-2-1:运动到粗刷起点 ===============
MOVE_TO_XY_IDLE_POSITION_EXTRUDER
G91 
G0 Y45 F12000
;===== 粗刷-2-2:去到刷嘴起点，启动相对坐标 ，进行粗刷 ===============
SET_VELOCITY_LIMIT ACCEL=10000
G91
G1 Y30 F12000
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 X-2
G1 Y-30
G4 P1000
G1 Y30 F12000
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 X-2
G1 Y-50
SET_HEATER_TEMPERATURE HEATER=extruder TARGET=140
;===== 找Z轴原点 （精刷基准） ================
G28 Z SAMPLES 1
;===== 精刷 =================
G90
G0 Z10 F300
MOVE_TO_XY_IDLE_POSITION_EXTRUDER
G91
G0 Y29 F10000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G91
G0 Z-0.2 F300
G0 X-1 Y1 F2000.1
G0 X-1 Y-1
G0 X1.25 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 X1 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 X1 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 X1 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 Y-0.8
G0 X6
G90
G0 Z3
;===== 粗刷 =================
MOVE_TO_XY_IDLE_POSITION_EXTRUDER
G91 
G0 Y45 F12000
G91
G1 Y30 F12000
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20
G1 X-2
G1 Y20 F12000
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20 
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 Y-20
G1 Y20 
G1 X0.5
G1 X-2
G1 Y-30
;===== 精刷 =================
G90
MOVE_TO_XY_IDLE_POSITION_EXTRUDER
G91
G0 Y29 F10000
PROBE SAMPLE_TRIG_FREQ=450 SAMPLES=1 PROBE_SPEED=5
G91
G0 Z-0.2 F300
G0 X-1 Y1 F2000.1
G0 X-1 Y-1
G0 X1.25 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 X1 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 X1 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 X1 Y-0.5
G0 X-1.5 Y1.5
G0 X-0.5 Y-1
G0 Y-0.8
G0 X6
;===== 第一个挤出头降温 =================
M190 S{bed_temperature_initial_layer_single}
M109 S140
G91
G0 Z5 F2000
G90
G28 Z
;===== 热床调平 =================
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE
;===== 预挤出 =================
M104 S{nozzle_temperature[current_extruder]}
G90
M83
G0 Z5 F2000
G0 X35 Y5 F2000
M109 S{nozzle_temperature[current_extruder]}
G0 X45 F20000
G0 Z0.2 F300
G1 X230 E10 F3000
G0 Z5 F2000
M82
